title: Made oath not to do certain sin but later found out it was not a sin, expiate oath? | AssimAlHakeem
transcript:
Louine from Canada says a person committed a sin   thinking it was a sin, took an oath not to do 
it again, then later on discovered that it is   not sinful, so can he do it? The answer is 'yes' 
but he has to expiate for that oath he had done.
